# useMediaTrack (hook)

## Import

```typescript
import { useMediaTrack } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                                                                         | Description  |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| source      | [VideoSource](./core/videosource.md) \| [AudioSource](./core/audiosource.md) |              |
| participant | Participant                                                                  | _(Optional)_ |
| options     | [UseMediaTrackOptions](./react/usemediatrackoptions.md)                      | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

{ publication: import("livekit-client").TrackPublication \| undefined; isMuted: boolean \| undefined; isSubscribed: boolean \| undefined; track: import("livekit-client").Track \| undefined; elementProps: React.HTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLElement&gt;; }
